Any suggestions on how to get around this problem, short of running the updates? I'd hate to quit using Firefox when streaming on Hulu.

title: Printer problems
content:
I have a Canon TR8620 printer and a desktop PC. Yesterday I tried printing off a couple of text selections from two different sites. Both times the printer malfunctioned, printed the selection only partially and kept repeating this until I turned the printer off.

I contacted Canon support, and we went through a series of troubleshooting exercises, and he determined there was no problem with the printer itself. He suggested I tried printing from another browser.

I switched to MS Edge and successfully printed off two different items without a hitch. He and I both agreed that it appears to be a Firefox problem.

I recently updated Firefox to 144.0.2 (64-bit) and am suspicious the problem may lie there. I am running Windows 11 Pro.

I don't necessarily have a question, I just thought you might want to be made aware of this problem.

title: Setting Problem
content:
Hello together, A colleague has been experiencing a display problem in a web application when opening it in the Firefox browser. The error affects a selection window that opens within an editing window of the application. Normally, all selection options are displayed completely and clearly in this window. Currently, however, this selection window is not displayed correctly: The individual options are only partially visible, and the user has to navigate awkwardly within the window using a scroll bar to select a function. The following measures have already been taken without success: Reinstallation of the Firefox browser Complete reconfiguration of the Firefox user profile It is noticeable that the problem only occurs for this one user. Other colleagues who also use the same web application with Firefox see the selection window displayed correctly. Can you help us?

Thank you for the support

title: Copy not preserving block new lines
content:
So if you go to My documentation page , go down to point 8 and try and copy the Systemd unit file from the browser to an editor, the line returns are not preserved and instead spaces are substituted. If I copy the text from a chrome browser into an editor, the new lines are preserved. I've copied the HTML source code below. 

       [Unit]        Description=Apache Tomcat 11.0 Web Application Container        After=network.target        
        [Service]        Type=forking        
        Environment="JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.25.0-openjdk-amd64"        Environment="CATALINA_PID=/opt/tomcat/Base/temp/tomcat.pid"        Environment="CATALINA_HOME=/opt/tomcat/tom11/"        Environment="CATALINA_BASE=/opt/tomcat/Base/"        Environment="CATALINA_OPTS=-Xms512M -Xmx1024M -server -XX:+UseParallelGC"        Environment="JAVA_OPTS=-Djava.awt.headless=true -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom"        ExecStart=/opt/tomcat/tom11/bin/startup.sh        ExecStop=/opt/tomcat/tom11/bin/shutdown.sh        User=tommy        Group=tommy        UMask=0007        RestartSec=10        Restart=always        [Install]        WantedBy=multi-user.target

So the code is rendering correctly in the browser, but is being incorrectly copied by Firefox. Note if you copy the above from this forum across to an editor the new lines are preserved, but if you copy it from the website they are not.

title: No guarda contrase√±as.
content: Firefox me tiene aburrido. Despu√©s de actualizar a la versi√≥n 14.03, comenzaron los problemas, (no guarda contrase√±as) Llevo con este problema m√°s de un mes. Repito todo fue despu√©s de actualizar. Cuando inicio la actualizaci√≥n a versi√≥n 14.03, la pantalla vi que hizo una cosa extra√±a. Y la finalizar la actualizaci√≥n comenz√≥ el problema de (no guarda contrase√±as) En un mes he hecho de todo, configuraciones, desinstalar FireFox y reinstalar, antes de nueva instalaci√≥n he borrado carpetas de FireFox he limpiado el registro, en resume he hecho de todo y el problema de guardar contrase√±as sigue, me tiene aburrido el FireFox. Siempre he preferido este navegador, desde hace mas de 30 a√±os, pero veo que el problema persiste, as√≠ que abandonare FireFox y me pasare a Chrome He instalado Chrome y no tiene problemas, he exportado contrase√±as a un fichero *.csv He importado este fichero a Firefox y lo importa sin ning√∫n problema y al hacer clic contrase√±as se ven 81 contrase√±as guardadas, pero cuando cierro Firefox y abro de nuevo, las contrase√±as guardas hace unos segundos hago clic en contrase√±as y sale diciendo, no hay contrase√±as guardadas. Repito esto ocurre desde la actualizaci√≥n, que repito vi en la pantalla algo extra√±o, durante el proceso de actualizaci√≥n. He escaneado con antivirus Norton con licencia, y no detecta virus. Resumen, en un mes he hecho de todo, ya se que soy un cabez√≥n que quiero arreglar estos problemas que tengo con FireFox. Con otro navegador (Chrome) no tengo problemas, pero me gusta m√°s Firefox. title: Clear history is not working
content:

I have manually cleared cookies and site data and history within Settings, but the it still remains under History even when I've closed Firefox and restarted the PC.

Under Sync, the box for History is not ticked.

This has been happening for some time without me realising. I have now deleted pages.sqlite and this has cleared the history, but it still retains all new site data under History and will not clear it.

I have disabled then uninstalled anti-virus, I have removed CCleaner because this was also not deleting history.

And I've also reinstalled Firefox, but the problem persists.

What am I doing wrong please?

I am using Windows 11.
